contact.title: Contact Us
contact.body: If you would like to discuss placing your vehicle in storage with us, or discuss any aspect of classic car ownership, please contact our sales team at Classic & Sportscar Centre.

home.title: Classic Car Storage
home.body: Maintained long and short term secure indoor storage for classic and modern cars.

about.title: Classic Car Storage
about.body: My name is Alex. I am a designer-developer with more than 10 years experience. I specialise in front end development using React, Sass CSS, and HTML. If you need my services to boost your output then do please contact me.

rates.title: Competitive Storage Rates
rates.body: We offer competitive storage rates, so please contact us if you wish to discuss storing your vehicle with us or are interested in any of the other services we offer.

transport.title: Transport
transport.body: Collection and drop off can be made with as little as 24 hoursâ€™ notice from our main site at Corner Farm, West Knapton, Malton.

items.title: Why choose us?
items.text: With 30 years' experience in the classic car industry, we are well placed to understand exactly how to keep your car in optimum condition whilst not in regular use.

items.title: Checked & Protected
items.text: On arrival your car will be cleaned, photographed, and inspected before being placed into our secure facility. Once in storage, it will be protected using a high-quality soft cover with regular battery checks and conditioning.

items.title: Transport
items.text: Our purpose-built enclosed transporters can collect your vehicle, or you can deliver your car to any of our sites in the Malton area. On arrival your car will be cleaned, photographed, and inspected before being placed into our secure facility.

items.title: Insured & Secure
items.text: Your vehicle will be comprehensively insured whilst in our possession and our secure premises are alarmed and under manned surveillance 24 hours a day.

items.title: Maintained
items.text: Whilst in our care, we can arrange various lubrication and maintenance packages and regular road testing should you require this service. Prior to your car being returned to you it will receive a complimentary valet, with all levels checked.

items.title: Accessories
items.text: Your vehicle will be comprehensively insured whilst in our possession and our secure premises are alarmed and under manned surveillance 24 hours a day.
